ghost

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages different components of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrightenedLength

        public long getFrightenedLength()
        Returns the length of frightened mode for the ghost.
        Returns:
        Frightened mode length.

      • getCoordinatesForDebug

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getCoordinatesForDebug(int k)
        It returns an array list of coordinates. The first element refers to the current x-axis position of ghost, second refers to the current y-axis position of the ghost, the third element refers to the target x-axis position of ghost, and fourth element represents the target y-axis position of ghost. The type of ghost is determined with the help of the parameter. The integer value 0 refers to the ambusher ghost, 1 refers to the ignorant ghost, 2 refers to the chaser ghost, and 3 refers to the whim ghost.
        Parameters:
        k - Number corresponding to the ghost type.
        Returns:
        Coordinates of ghost, and its target positions.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        It is called sixty (frame rate) times per second. It performs all the necessary calculations for GameManager objects. It finds the frightened mode start time, adds it to the list of frightened time, and from the current time it decides whether the ghost is in frightened mode or not.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        It is called sixty (frame rate) times per second.
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet app object.
